name: BS Super Mario Collection: Dai-1-shuu
overview: BS Super Mario Collection is a remake of Super Mario Collection for the Satellaview. The game was released in four installments as a Soundlink game entry. Dai-1-shuu: Mario transverses a SMB3-like overworld to enter SMB1 Worlds 1 through 5 initially. In the meantime, voice commentary is supplied by Mario and Yuuki Nae, a Satellaview Radio Personality
